title: Leading games on Twitch as of July 2019 , by hours viewed
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Video Game, and a y axis representing Number of hours in millions.
The highest category is found at Fortnite where Number of hours in millions is 24.8.
The lowest category is found at Apex_Legends where Number of hours in millions is 4.0.
gold: This statistic presents the leading gaming content from July 22 to July 28 , 2019 , ranked by number of hours viewed . Fortnite had the longest viewing time that week , with 24.8 million hours viewed across the Twitch network .
